00023 #include <Parametre_diffusion_implicite.h>
00024 #include <Param.h>
00025 
00026 Implemente_instanciable_sans_constructeur(Parametre_diffusion_implicite,"Parametre_diffusion_implicite",Parametre_equation_base);
00027 
00028 // Par defaut les seuils sont negatifs (donc pas utilisables!!)
00029 Parametre_diffusion_implicite::Parametre_diffusion_implicite()
00030 {
00031   preconditionnement_diag_=0;
00032   crank_=0;
00033   nb_it_max_=-1;
00034   seuil_diffusion_implicite_=-1;
00035 
00036 }
00037 
00038 Sortie& Parametre_diffusion_implicite::printOn(Sortie& os) const
00039 {
00040   return os;
00041 }
00042 // XD parametre_diffusion_implicite parametre_equation_base parametre_diffusion_implicite -1 To specify additional parameters for the equation when using impliciting diffusion
00043 // XD attr crank entier(into=[0,1]) crank 1 Use (1) or not (0, default) a Crank Nicholson method for the diffusion implicitation algorithm. Setting crank to 1 increases the order of the algorithm from 1 to 2.
00044 // XD attr preconditionnement_diag entier(into=[0,1]) preconditionnement_diag 1 The CG used to solve the implicitation of the equation diffusion operator is not preconditioned by default. If this option is set to 1, a diagonal preconditionning is used. Warning: this option is not necessarily more efficient, depending on the treated case.
00045 // XD attr niter_max_diffusion_implicite entier niter_max_diffusion_implicite 1 Change the maximum number of iterations for the CG (Conjugate Gradient) algorithm when solving the diffusion implicitation of the equation.
00046 // XD attr seuil_diffusion_implicite floattant seuil_diffusion_implicite 1 Change the threshold convergence value used by default for the CG resolution for the diffusion implicitation of this equation.
00047 // XD attr solveur solveur_sys_base solveur 1 Method (different from the default one, Conjugate Gradient) to solve the linear system.
00048 Entree& Parametre_diffusion_implicite::readOn(Entree& is)
00049 {
00050   Param param(que_suis_je());
00051   param.ajouter("crank",&crank_);
00052   param.ajouter("niter_max_diffusion_implicite",&nb_it_max_);
00053   param.ajouter("preconditionnement_diag",&preconditionnement_diag_);
00054   param.ajouter("seuil_diffusion_implicite",&seuil_diffusion_implicite_);
00055   param.ajouter_non_std("solveur",(this));
00056   param.lire_avec_accolades_depuis(is);
00057   return is;
00058 }
00059 
00060 int Parametre_diffusion_implicite::lire_motcle_non_standard(const Motcle& mot, Entree& is)
00061 {
00062   Motcle motlu;
00063   if (mot=="solveur")
00064     {
00065       is >> solveur_;
00066       solveur_.nommer("solveur_diffusion_implicite");
00067     }
00068   else
00069     {
00070       Cerr << mot << " is not a keyword understood by " << que_suis_je() << " in lire_motcle_non_standard"<< finl;
00071       exit();
00072     }
00073   return -1;
00074 }
